instruction: Please draft an email to Oliver Marchand and Phanos Hadjikyriakou thanking them for their assistance with the Global Warming Potential model and the calculated scenarios.
output:
Dear Oliver and Phanos, 
I wanted to take a moment to express my sincere gratitude for your invaluable help with the Global Warming Potential model and the calculated scenarios. Your expertise and hard work were instrumental in ensuring the success of our project. We couldn't have done it without you! 
Thank you again for your support and dedication.
Best regards, [Your Name]
